resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107956</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107956</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086770</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Put on a happy face.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Setzen Sie an ein glückliches Gesicht.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mettez en fonction un visage heureux.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ponha sobre uma cara feliz.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Metta sopra una faccia felice.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τεθειμένος σε ένα ευτυχές πρόσωπο.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ponga encendido una cara feliz.</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A 1923 billboard advertisement for Endicott-Johnson shoes touted employee satisfaction as an important feature of the product. Company president George F. Johnson was a leading proponent of welfare capitalism</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Anschlagtafelreklameanzeige 1923 für 
Endicott-Johnson Schuhe kündigte Angestellt-Zufriedenheit als 
wichtiges Merkmal des Produktes an. Firmapräsident George F. 
Johnson war ein führender Antragsteller von Wohlfahrt Kapitalismus</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une publicité 1923 de panneau-réclame pour des 
chaussures d'Endicott-Johnson a espionné la satisfaction des
employés comme dispositif important du produit. Président 
George F. Johnson de compagnie était un principal partisan de 
capitalisme d'assistance sociale</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma propaganda 1923 do billboard para sapatas de 
Endicott-Johnson touted a satisfação do empregado como uma 
característica importante do produto. O presidente George F. 
Johnson da companhia era um proponent principal do capitalismo de 
bem-estar</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una pubblicità 1923 del tabellone per le affissioni per i
pattini di Endicott-Johnson touted la soddisfazione degli impiegati 
come caratteristica importante del prodotto. Il presidente 
George F. Johnson dell'azienda era un fautore principale del 
capitalismo di assistenza sociale</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια διαφήμιση πινάκων διαφημίσεων του 1923 για 
κρμία την παπούτσια ικανοποίηση υπαλλήλων ενδηθοττ- Johnson ως 
σημαντικό χαρακτηριστικό γνώρισμα του προϊόντος. Η 
επιχείρηση Πρόεδρος George F. Johnson ήταν κύριος 
υπερασπιστής της κεφαλαιοκρατίας ευημερίας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un anuncio 1923 de la cartelera para los zapatos de 
Endicott-Johnson touted la satisfacción del empleado como 
característica importante del producto. Presidente George F. 
Johnson de la compañía era un autor principal del capitalismo de 
bienestar</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:CENTER FOR HISTORY AND NEW MEDIA/AMERICAN SOCIAL HISTORY PROJECT
FN:CENTER FOR HISTORY AND NEW MEDIA/AMERICAN SOCIAL HISTORY PROJECT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086770</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">No License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107956</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/put-on-a-happy-face</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
